div.head: CHAP. I. Touching the certainty of the Holy Scriptures.
div.p: Q. BUt whence appeareth it that the Holy Scriptures both of the Old and New Covenant are certain and not Å¿uspected?

div.head: CHAP. III. Of the Lords Supper.

Heb. 8. 1. 2, 3. 4. Heb. 9. 24. Heb. 7. 27. Heb. 10. 14.

p.label: Q.

div.p:

div.head: CHAP. VI. Concerning the PromiÅ¿e of the holy Spirit.
div.p: Q. DEclare to me the other PromiÅ¿e, and explain what the Gift of the holy Spirit is?

p.label: Q.
